text: Daejeon Station is a train station on Geungbu railroad, 166.6 km south of Seoul Station. == History == The station opened on January 1, 1905, in the period of Korea under Japanese rule. The station was expanded in 2015.Korea Rail Network Authority blog == References == == Other websites == * Korea Train eXpress * Daejeon Station in Korail Category:1905 establishments in Korea Category:Railway stations in South Korea
title: Daejeon Station
